thread.title: Stonebridge Companies’ Hampton Inn by Hilton Boulder Louisville Welcomes Guests to Lafayette’s Fall Festival this October
thread.title_full: Stonebridge Companies’ Hampton Inn by Hilton Boulder Louisville Welcomes Guests to Lafayette’s Fall Festival this October

author: Maggie Mistovich
title: Stonebridge Companies’ Hampton Inn by Hilton Boulder Louisville Welcomes Guests to Lafayette’s Fall Festival this October
text:
This fall, Lafayette’s Fall Festival offers three great community events in one place. On Sunday, October 25th, everyone is welcome to Bob L. Burger Recreation Center from 3:30 to 5:30 pm to celebrate. The Fall Festival will include a bounce house, annual pumpkin race and awards for the window painting and pumpkin decorating contests. Tickets are available with prices ranging from $3 to $8, depending on residency status in Lafayette. Located just 15 minutes from Lafayette, the Hampton Inn by Hilton Boulder Louisville welcomes Fall Festival attendees to stay the night and discover more of what the area has to offer. The Hampton offers great amenities, group accommodations and comfortable hotel rooms, perfect for business and leisure travelers. Amenities include free Wi-Fi throughout the hotel, complimentary breakfast daily, indoor pool and fitness center. Guests may choose from king, double queen, king study and accessible rooms, available upon request. Each room features free Wi-Fi, HDTV, desk, coffeemaker, microwave and mini refrigerator, ideal for families or the extended-stay guest.
For reservations and more information on the Hampton Inn by Hilton Boulder Louisville, please visit http://www.louisvillehampton.com or call (303) 666-7700. The Hampton Inn by Hilton Boulder Louisville is proudly managed by Stonebridge Companies in Denver, Colo.
Founded in 1991 by Navin C. Dimond, Stonebridge Companies is a privately owned, innovative hotel owner, operator and developer headquartered near Denver. Its diverse listing of properties includes select-service, extended-stay, mid-scale and full-service hotels in markets throughout the U.S. For detailed information, visit http://www.sbcos.com .
